arguments.name: Start_date and end_date
arguments.description: The dates for which the difference is to be computed. The start_date can be earlier than, the same as, or later than the end_date.

arguments.name: Weekend
arguments.description: Indicates the days of the week that are weekend days and are not included in the number of whole working days between start_date and end_date. Weekend is a weekend number or string that specifies when weekends occur.
